name: Pom Pom Purin Water Slide
description:
This was created for Dive Jam 2, however I entered the jam kind of late. I'm pretty happy with what I could get done in a day at least! 

Play as Pom Pom Purin in this exciting adventure where you slide down a water slide, then go back up and do it again! Hours of entertainment guaranteed! Who needs gameplay anyway?
